article_title: The key developments on Day 41 of the war.
sentence: Her  husband,  Shmuel,  was  killed  by  Hamas  gunmen.

article_title: The key developments on Day 41 of the war.
sentence: Israel  said  its  security  forces  had  killed  three  gunmen  who  opened  fire  at  a  checkpoint  on  a  road  leading  into  Jerusalem  from  the  West  Bank.

article_title: The key developments on Day 41 of the war.
sentence: Israel  says  one  of  its  soldiers  was  killed  and  others  were  wounded.
